tfff 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

tfff

This is an internal package for the Ford Family Foundation to help make data viz, get data, etc.

Installation

You can install the development version of tfff from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("rfortherestofus/tfff")
